example.text: Take a look at [[user]] & [[user]]’s “secure” border – folks lining up to enter our country illegally as soon as Title 42 ends. Is the Administration incompetent or just deceitful with its claims it has everything under control? Either way, Americans deserve better. [[url]]

The [[user]] makes no bones about not favoring charter school programs, but these schools are hurting without any increase in funding in recent years, especially when you factor in inflation. Hope we can address this as we write the [[user]] FY24 appropriations bill.

I enjoyed being able to help promote the Mississippi Blue Economy [link 8] initiative, which is another example of our state making well-targeted investments in economic development, job training, and education. We can look forward to an even stronger Mississippi as these investments come to fruition.

Take a look at [[user]] & [[user]]’s “secure” border – folks lining up to enter our country illegally as soon as Title 42 ends. Is the Administration incompetent or just deceitful with its claims it has everything under control? Either way, Americans deserve better. [[url]]

Wishing a very happy 75th birthday to Israel! A strong US-Israel relationship is critical to both of our nations’ security & I will continue to stand with Israel, as Israel stands with us. I look forward to many more years of friendship. ? ? [[url]]

We've got to consider innovations to help alleviate the growing stress on rural health care & those who rely on it. [[user]]'s bill would improve access for seniors by reimbursing pharmacists who offer basic health care services to Medicare beneficiaries. Read:
